app.title: GD Tracker
app.subtitle: Gestational Diabetes Monitor
app.description: Track your gestational diabetes glucose readings

dashboard.title: Your Readings
dashboard.target: Target: Fasting <91 mg/dL, 1hr After Meal <140 mg/dL

readings.noReadingsSubtext: Add your first reading to get started

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reading?

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to add a reading
errors.invalidGlucose: Glucose value must be between 0 and 500

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to edit a reading
errors.invalidGlucose: Glucose value must be between 0 and 500
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to edit this reading

pdf.title: Glucose Readings Report
pdf.targetRanges: Target Ranges: Fasting <{fasting} mg/dL | 1hr After Meal <{meal} mg/dL

prompt.message: Get notified about glucose measurement reminders and important updates

fasting.heading: ðŸ©¸ Fasting Glucose Reminder
fasting.content: Time to measure your fasting glucose level

1hr_after_meal.heading: ðŸ©¸ Post-Meal Glucose Reminder
1hr_after_meal.content: Time to measure your glucose level (1hr after meal)

mealWindows.title: Meal Time Windows
mealWindows.description: Set your typical meal times to receive accurate reminders. Only measurements within these windows will be used for scheduling.

help.title: How Meal Windows Work
help.point1: Set the time range when you typically measure each type (e.g., fasting: 7:30-9:00)
help.point2: Measurements outside these windows will be ignored for reminder scheduling
help.point3: This helps filter out late entries and improves reminder accuracy
